summary.span: Represents an SQL statement or stored procedure to execute against a data source.

span.span: Represents an SQL statement or stored procedure to execute against a data source.

summary.span: This class cannot be inherited.

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供了以下方法用来对数据源执行命令：The class provides the following methods for executing commands against a data source: |项Item|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| ||执行返回行的命令。Executes commands that return rows.| ||执行命令，例如 SQL INSERT、 DELETE、 UPDATE 和 SET 语句。Executes commands such as SQL INSERT, DELETE, UPDATE, and SET statements.| ||从数据库中检索单个值，例如，一个聚合值。Retrieves a single value, for example, an aggregate value, from a database.| 你可以重置属性和重复使用对象。You can reset the property and reuse the object. 但是，您必须关闭执行新的或上一命令之前。However, you must close the before you can execute a new or previous command. 如果执行此命令会导致严重SQL Server 严重级别为 20 或更多，例如可能会关闭。If execution of the command causes a fatal such as a SQL Server severity level of 20 or more, may close. 但是，用户可以重新打开连接并继续操作。However, the user can reopen the connection and continue. ## Examples 下面的示例使用。The following example uses . [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OdbcCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcCommand/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OdbcCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcCommand/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Cancel() cil managed

summary.span: Tries to cancel the execution of an .

span.span: Tries to cancel the execution of an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果没有要取消的命令，则不会有任何反应。If there is nothing to cancel, nothing occurs. 但是，如果在过程中，命令，并且取消尝试失败，会不生成任何异常。However, if there is a command in process, and the cancellation try fails, no exception is generated. 取消一个线程上的查询必须从另一个线程调用。To cancel a query on one thread, must be called from another thread. 因为您不能使用执行命令，以异步方式，若要取消从另一个线程，命令必须以同步方式运行一个线程。Because you cannot execute commands asynchronously with , to cancel a command from another thread, one thread must be running synchronously. 这意味着，对象必须可从两个线程访问。This means that the object must be accessible from both threads.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("Microsoft.VSDesigner.Data.Odbc.Design.OdbcCommandTextEditor, Microsoft.VSDesigner, Version=0.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: Gets or sets the SQL statement or stored procedure to execute against the data source.

span.span: Gets or sets the SQL statement or stored procedure to execute against the data source.

value.span: 要执行的 SQL 语句或存储过程。

span.span: The SQL statement or stored procedure to execute.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为`StoredProcedure`，则属性应设置使用标准 ODBC 存储过程转义序列。When the property is set to `StoredProcedure`, the property should be set using standard ODBC stored procedure escape sequences. 设置为存储过程的名称不能与它为其他.NET Framework 数据提供程序。Setting the to the name of the stored procedure does not function as it does for other .NET Framework data providers. 许多语言功能，例如外部联接和标量函数调用，通常被实现的数据源。Many language features, such as outer joins and scalar function calls, are generally implemented by data sources. 即使这些功能的语法通常是特定于源的数据。Even the syntax for these features is generally data source-specific. 因此，ODBC 定义包含以下语言功能的标准语法的转义序列：Therefore, ODBC defines escape sequences that contain standard syntax for the following language features: - 日期、 时间、 时间戳和日期时间间隔文本Date, time, timestamp, and datetime interval literals - 标量函数，例如数字、 字符串和数据类型转换函数Scalar functions such as numeric, string, and data type conversion functions - 喜欢谓词转义字符LIKE predicate escape character - 外部联接Outer joins - 过程调用Procedure calls 使用 ODBC 的转义序列是按如下所示：The escape sequence used by ODBC is as follows: ``` {extension} ``` 此转义序列进行识别和分析由 ODBC 驱动程序。This escape sequence is recognized and parsed by ODBC drivers. 然后，它们与数据源特定语法替换任何转义序列。They then replace any escape sequences with data source-specific grammar. 过程是在数据源中存储的可执行对象。A procedure is an executable object stored at the data source. 通常情况下，它是已预编译的一个或多个 SQL 语句。Generally, it is one or more SQL statements that have been precompiled. 调用过程的转义序列是The escape sequence for calling a procedure is ``` {[?=]call procedure-name[([parameter][,[parameter]]...)]} ``` 其中`procedure-name`指定过程的名称和`parameter`指定过程参数。where `procedure-name` specifies the name of a procedure and `parameter` specifies a procedure parameter. 该命令时调用 Execute 方法之一执行此存储的过程 (例如，或)。The command executes this stored procedure when you call one of the Execute methods (for example, or ). 不能设置，和时当前连接正在执行 execute 或提取操作的属性。You cannot set the , and properties if the current connection is performing an execute or fetch operation. ODBC.NET 提供程序不支持命名的参数，将参数传递给 SQL 语句或存储的过程调用的时设置为`Text`。The ODBC.NET Provider does not support named parameters for passing parameters to an SQL statement or a stored procedure called by an when is set to `Text`. 在这种情况下，必须使用问号 （？） 占位符。In this case, the question mark (?) placeholder must be used. 例如：For example: ``` SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE CustomerID = ? ``` 因此，在其中的顺序对象添加到必须直接对应于参数的问号占位符的位置。Therefore, the order in which objects are added to the must directly correspond to the position of the question mark placeholder for the parameter. 如果参数包含 null 值，用于 ODBC 的.NET Framework 数据提供程序仍将该参数绑定，但将使用默认参数，如果通过使用 SQL_DEFAULT_PARAM，而不 null 值定义的一个。If a parameter contains a null value, the .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC still binds that parameter, but uses a default parameter, if one has been defined by using SQL_DEFAULT_PARAM, instead of the null value. 例如， :For example, the : ``` {1, null, 2} ``` 传递到属性：passed into the property: ``` {call sp(?, ?, ?)} ``` 用于绑定的第一个参数为值 1、 第三个参数的值为 2 和 SQL_DEFAULT_PARAM 作为第二个参数的 ODBC 将导致.NET Framework 数据提供程序。causes the .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC binding the first parameter to the value 1, the third parameter to the value 2, and the second parameter as SQL_DEFAULT_PARAM. 但是，此行为是依赖于驱动程序的。However, this behavior is driver-dependent. 如果驱动程序不支持此功能，只是不要传递的值中的参数。If the driver does not support this functionality, just do not pass in a value for the parameter. 例如，使用:For example, use the : ``` {1, 2} ``` 设置和属性设置为以下：and set the property to the following: ``` {call sp(?, null, ?)} ``` > [!NOTE] > 如果省略一个参数，则仍必须显示的逗号分隔该参数与其他参数。If a parameter is omitted, the comma delimiting it from other parameters must still appear. 如果省略输入参数或输入/输出参数，则该过程使用参数的默认值。If an input or input/output parameter is omitted, the procedure uses the default value of the parameter. 另一种方法来指定输入参数或输入/输出参数的默认值是设置的长度/指示器缓冲区的值绑定到为 SQL_DEFAULT_PARAM 参数。Another way to specify the default value of an input or input/output parameter is to set the value of the length/indicator buffer bound to the parameter to SQL_DEFAULT_PARAM.

summary.span: Gets or sets the wait time before terminating an attempt to execute a command and generating an error.

span.span: Gets or sets the wait time before terminating an attempt to execute a command and generating an error.

value.span: 等待命令执行所需的时间（以秒为单位）。

span.span: The time in seconds to wait for the command to execute.
The default is 30 seconds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值为零 (0) 指定的等待时间，而不是没有等待时间，没有限制，因此应当避免。A value of zero (0) specifies no limit to the wait time, instead of no wait time, and therefore should be avoided.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为`StoredProcedure`，应设置属性设置为完整的 ODBC 调用语法。When the property is set to `StoredProcedure`, you should set the property to the full ODBC call syntax. 该命令执行此存储的过程调用 Execute 方法之一时 (例如，或)。The command then executes this stored procedure when you call one of the Execute methods (for example, or ). ，和不能设置属性，如果当前连接正在执行 execute 或 fetch 操作。The , and properties cannot be set if the current connection is performing an execute or fetch operation. 用于 ODBC 的.NET Framework 数据提供程序不支持传递命名参数的 SQL 语句或存储过程调用的。The .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC does not support passing named parameters to an SQL statement or to a stored procedure called by an . 无论在哪一种情况下，使用问号 （？） 占位符。In either of these cases, use the question mark (?) placeholder. 例如：For example: ``` SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE CustomerID = ? ``` 依据的顺序对象添加到必须直接对应于参数的问号占位符的位置。The order in which objects are added to the must directly correspond to the position of the question mark placeholder for the parameter. > [!NOTE] > 用于 ODBC 的.NET Framework 数据提供程序不支持设置的`TableDirect`。The .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC does not support the setting of `TableDirect`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能设置， ，和时当前连接正在执行 execute 或提取操作的属性。You cannot set the , , and properties if the current connection is performing an execute or fetch operation. 如果在事务执行过程中设置了 ，并且 属性不为 null，则会生成 。If you set while a transaction is in progress and the property is not null, an is generated. 如果您设置提交或回滚事务后，属性不为 null，属性设置为 null 值。If you set after the transaction has been committed or rolled back, and the property is not null, the property is then set to a null value.

summary.span: Executes an SQL statement against the and returns the number of rows affected.

span.span: Executes an SQL statement against the and returns the number of rows affected.

returns.span: For UPDATE, INSERT, and DELETE statements, the return value is the number of rows affected by the command.

span.span: For UPDATE, INSERT, and DELETE statements, the return value is the number of rows affected by the command.

returns.span: For all other types of statements, the return value is -1.

span.span: For all other types of statements, the return value is -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用执行目录操作 （例如，查询数据库的结构或创建数据库对象，如表）; 或在数据库中，将数据更改而无需使用、 通过执行插入、 更新或删除语句。You can use to perform catalog operations (for example, querying the structure of a database or creating database objects such as tables); or to change the data in a database, without using a , by executing UPDATE, INSERT, or DELETE statements. 此外可以使用执行多个 SQL 语句，如果基础 ODBC 驱动程序支持此功能。You can also use to execute multiple SQL statements if the underlying ODBC driver supports this functionality. 在这种情况下，返回值是通过在命令中的所有语句影响的行数。In this case, the return value is the number of rows affected by all statements in the command. 尽管返回任何行，任何输出参数或返回的数据填充映射到参数的值。Although returns no rows, any output parameters or return values mapped to parameters are populated with data. 对于 UPDATE、 INSERT 和 DELETE 语句，返回值为命令所影响的行数。For UPDATE, INSERT, and DELETE statements, the return value is the number of rows affected by the command. 对于所有其他类型的语句，返回值为-1。For all other types of statements, the return value is -1. 如果发生回滚，则返回值也为-1。If a rollback occurs, the return value is also -1. 存在触发器对表和数据是要添加或更改表中，返回的值包括受 insert 或 update 操作和触发器或触发器的影响的行数的行数。When a trigger exists on a table and data is being added or changed in the table, the return value includes the number of rows affected by both the insert or update operation and the number of rows affected by the trigger or triggers.

span.span: The connection does not exist.
-or- The connection is not open.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应设置属性设置为存储过程的完整 ODBC 调用语法。You should set the property to the full ODBC call syntax for stored procedures. 该命令执行此存储的过程调用时。The command executes this stored procedure when you call . 虽然使用时，关联是繁忙的服务。While the is used, the associated is busy serving the . 在此状态下，没有其他操作可以执行上而不关闭它。While in this state, no other operations can be performed on the other than closing it. 这是种情况一直方法的调用。This is the case until the method of the is called.

summary.span: Sends the to the , and builds an using one of the values.

span.span: Sends the to the , and builds an using one of the values.
An object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您期望的 SQL 语句，以返回单个行，则指定`SingleRow`作为值可能会提高应用程序的性能。If you expect your SQL statement to return only a single row, specifying `SingleRow` as the value may improve application performance. 应设置属性设置为存储过程的完整 ODBC 调用语法。You should set the property to the full ODBC call syntax for stored procedures. 该命令执行此存储的过程调用时。The command executes this stored procedure when you call . 支持启用大型二进制值，以高效读取以特殊模式。The supports a special mode that enables large binary values to be read efficiently. 有关详细信息，请参阅`SequentialAccess`设置为。For more information, see the `SequentialAccess` setting for . > [!NOTE] > `SequentialAccess`的值是不限制设置; 它只是意味着必须将至少顺序访问。The `SequentialAccess` value of is not a limiting setting; it just means that you will have at least sequential access to the . 例如，当使用中的 SQL Server ODBC 驱动程序`SequentialAccess`模式下，仍可以移动到的第一列后具有读取按顺序处理所有其他列的行。For example, when you use the SQL Server ODBC Driver in `SequentialAccess` mode, you can still move to the first column of an row after having read through all the other columns sequentially. 虽然使用时，关联是繁忙的服务。While the is used, the associated is busy serving the . 在此状态下，没有其他操作可以执行上而不关闭它。While in this state, no other operations can be performed on the other than closing it. 这种情况，直到你调用方法。This is the case until you call the method. 如果使用创建设置为`CloseConnection`，正在关闭自动关闭的连接。If the is created with set to `CloseConnection`, closing the closes the connection automatically.

summary.span: Executes the query, and returns the first column of the first row in the result set returned by the query.

span.span: Executes the query, and returns the first column of the first row in the result set returned by the query.

summary.span: Additional columns or rows are ignored.

span.span: Additional columns or rows are ignored.

returns.span: The first column of the first row in the result set, or a null reference if the result set is empty.

span.span: The first column of the first row in the result set, or a null reference if the result set is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法来从数据源中检索单个值 （例如，一个聚合值）。Use the method to retrieve a single value (for example, an aggregate value) from a data source. 这需要比使用更少的代码方法，以及执行从返回的数据生成单个值所需的操作。This requires less code than using the method, and then performing the operations required to generate the single value from the data returned by an .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Parameters As OdbcParameterCollection

summary.span: Gets the .

span.span: Gets the .

value.span: SQL 语句或存储过程的参数。

span.span: The parameters of the SQL statement or stored procedure.
The default is an empty collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当设置为`Text`，用于 ODBC 的.NET Framework 数据提供程序不支持传递命名参数的 SQL 语句或存储过程调用的。When is set to `Text`, the .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC does not support passing named parameters to an SQL statement or to a stored procedure called by an . 无论在哪一种情况下，使用问号 （？） 占位符。In either of these cases, use the question mark (?) placeholder. 例如：For example: ``` SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE CustomerID = ? ``` 依据的顺序对象添加到必须直接对应于问号占位符参数的命令文本中的位置。The order in which objects are added to the must directly correspond to the position of the question mark placeholder for the parameter in the command text. > [!NOTE] > 如果在集合中的参数与要执行的查询的要求不匹配，则可能会导致错误。If the parameters in the collection do not match the requirements of the query to be executed, an error may result.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Prepare() cil managed

summary.span: Creates a prepared or compiled version of the command at the data source.

span.span: Creates a prepared or compiled version of the command at the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用 ODBC`SQLPrepare`函数。The method calls the ODBC `SQLPrepare` function. 具体取决于基础 ODBC 驱动程序和数据源的功能，准备的语句，如果未绑定所有参数，或在执行它，如果不是所有参数都已都都绑定时，可能会检查参数信息，例如数据类型。Depending on the capabilities of the underlying ODBC driver and data source, parameter information such as data types may be checked when the statement is prepared, if all parameters have been bound, or when it is executed if not all parameters have been bound. 应用程序应取消应用于上一个 SQL 语句准备新的 SQL 语句在同一个之前的所有参数都绑定的最大互操作性， 。For maximum interoperability, an application should unbind all parameters that applied to a previous SQL statement before preparing a new SQL statement on the same . 这可以防止引起以前被应用于新的 SQL 语句的参数信息的错误。This prevents errors that are caused by previous parameter information being applied to the new SQL statement. 如果调用后调用 Execute 方法，任何大于指定的值的参数值属性将被自动截断到初始指定大小的参数，并会返回任何截断错误.If you call an Execute method after you call , any parameter value that is larger than the value specified by the property is automatically truncated to the original specified size of the parameter, and no truncation errors are returned. 输出参数 （无论是否已准备） 必须具有用户指定的数据类型。Output parameters (whether prepared or not) must have a user-specified data type. 如果指定可变长度数据类型，则必须指定最大值。If you specify a variable length data type, you must also specify the maximum .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能设置如果它已被设置为特定值，并且该命令执行的过程中的属性。You cannot set the property if it is already set to a specific value, and the command is in the process of executing. 如果事务属性设置为未连接到相同的对象作为对象，请尝试执行语句，下一步时将会引发异常。If you set the transaction property to an object that is not connected to the same as the object, an exception will be thrown the next time that you try to execute a statement.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值值是**同时**除非自动生成命令，如同，默认值是在这种情况下**None**。The default value is **Both** unless the command is automatically generated, as with the , in which case the default is **None**. 有关如何使用详细信息属性，请参阅[DataAdapter 参数](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-parameters.md)。For more information about how to use the property, see [DataAdapter Parameters](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-parameters.md).
